attributes.action: Close, large corporation, tax loop holes.  Sold in Britain Taxed in Britain.
attributes.background: UK people are fed up of Major corporations avoiding tax legally at the expense of our UK services that are suffering major cuts.  Especially, when the large corporations make millions in un taxed profits in the UK.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
